explanation: [0-0] Against a starry sky backdrop, a man in a black shirt and blue pants and a woman in a red shirt and blue pants are trapped in two adjacent pits labeled A and B. Both are standing on wooden ladders that lead to the ground level. A wolf is prowling on the grass near the pits. The woman has several red bricks at her feet.

[0-8] As thunder rumbles in the sky, the man starts climbing up. The woman picks up a brick and throws it at him. The man is hit by the brick and falls back down. He holds his head in his hands as the wolf leaps to the left.
